channel.title: Help with quest making
channel.description:
I've set up some stuff to work ... however nothing seems to happen when I try to open up the quest help (I have added the code to the client.java)
Also when I set the npc dialogue to make the quest equal 1 (q12 = 1;) nothing happens either ... (quest doesn't go yellow) and you can't go onto the next part ...
Evidently I've got to add some code somewhere else that saves the quest (yes there is a q12 in the character files) But i'm not sure what this code is or where it should go (I'll be able to work out what it is once I found out where it goes)

item.title: Help with quest making
item.dc:creator: @lord_killord lord killord
item.description:
@lord_killord wrote:

Umm nice spam post? Now can someone actually help me
